commandDesc: Adds blocks of the given blockNbr or blockName to your inventory
commandHelp: Accepts different parameters, omitting quantity will give you 16 blocks by default, or a special quantity like 1 in case of a chest.Type <help blockList> for a list of blocks. Possible parameter switches : "giveBlock blockNbr" "giveBlock blockNbr, quantity" "giveBlock blockName" "giveBlock blockName, quantity"
examples: <giveBlock "Chest"> Gives you a Chest block you can place, activate ('E'), put stuff in, destroy, pick up, place elsewhere, find same stuff in it!

commandDesc: adds an item of the specified itemName to your inventory
commandHelp: type "help itemList" for a list of available items. just a note : core:gelatinousCube doesn't actually give you a cube
examples: <giveItem "core:book"> Gives a book of the core game

commandHelp: Usefull to immediatly regain full health
parameters are mandatory, and should be whole numbers

commandDesc: Moves the player to another world, can specify a seed parameter to it.
writes out information on all entities to a text file for debugging
shows the collision of nearby blocks
Shows help about a subject, currently only commands
Debug command - makes a dirt block loot to your inventory
Debug command - maps a key to a function
Enables typical key bindings for AZERTY keyboards
